Title: Relates to clarifying which entities handle the reporting of pregnancy loss
Summary: Relates to clarifying which entities handle the reporting of pregnancy loss; the responsibilities of health care providers and penalties for not protecting the identities of individuals who suffered a pregnancy loss.
LawCode: Amd Art 41 Title 5 Title Head, §§4160, 4160-a, 4161, 4163 & 4162, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to reporting pregnancy losses and clarifying which agencies are responsible for such reports; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
